appIntro: The most capital efficient AMM Protocol on Mixin Virtual Machine

swap.title: Swap
swap.price_impact_warning_info: A swap of this size may have a massive price impact. There may be a huge difference between the input amount and the output amount, this may cause capital losses, please pay attention.
swap.please_switch_to_mvm: Please switch your wallet's network to MVM to continue

pool.title: Pool
pool.select_pool_type_info: Choose the Pegged asset if the two token values are identical. If not, choose the non-Pegged asset.
pool.enter_pool_info_info: Enter the name and the asset contract addresses of the pool
pool.parameters_info: In most cases, the default value is fine. Make sure you understand what you are doing before modifying it.
pool.check_to_make_sure: Check to make sure everything is correct before deployment, You can't edit the parameters once the pool is deployed.

bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.view_address_info: Pay by make a transfer to the address
bridge.memo_required: Memo is required, or you will lose your fund!
bridge.loading_deposit_text: Your deposit will be shown here soon
bridge.make_sure_network: Please make sure your wallet is connected to
bridge.please_wait_x_minutes: Please wait around {min} minutes until the deposit is completed
bridge.then_confirm: then confirm bridging to complete the process.
bridge.network_is_not_evm_compatible: Network is not evm compatible, please pay by transfer to address.
bridge.this_value_may_change: This value may change with price fluctuations.
bridge.fee_is_the_sum_of: Fee is the sum of the transaction gas and the withdrawal fee
bridge.bridge_info:
Rate
Slippage tolerance
Price Impact
Minium received
Transfer time
bridge.slippage_tolerance_info: The transaction will revert if the return losses from changes exceed this percentage.
bridge.enhance_privacy_info: Enhance privacy by delaying bridging for a random amount of time, less than five minutes.

error.must_switch_network_to_continue: You must switch network to continue

search.pool: Search by pool name, pool address, token name or token address
search.asset: Search by token name or symbol

technical.fee_info: Trading fees collected for each swap
technical.min_receive_info: Minium amount of token you will receive
technical.virtual_price_info: The current price of the pool LP token relative to the underlying pool assets, this is not a dollar value
technical.a_info: Determines a pool's tolerance for imbalance. A higher value means that trades will incur slippage sooner
technical.excepted_output_info: Amount of token you will receive
technical.price_impact_info: Percentage of token price will change
technical.trade_through_info: Pools the transaction will go through

main_t: The most capital efficient decentralized exchange on Mixin Virtual Machine.
decentralized_t: Based on smart contract. No one, not even the development team, can ever shut it down.
capital_efficient_t: Better than Uniswap v2, with lower slippage, more profit for LPs and traders
owned_by_people_t: Everyone can join to share the protocol revenue
tested_by_time_t: The Underlying Protocol is tested by time.
technology_t: Supports unlimited assets and chains, runs on MVM, no gas cost when using Mixin Messenger
developer_friendly_t: Developer in mind, easy to integrate
join_community_t: Join our community to share your opinions and get the latest updates
permissionless_t: Anyone can trade and create new trading pairs without any permission
